title: TerraMaster F4-425 4-Bay NAS — Intel Quad-Core, 4 GB RAM, 2.5 GbE LAN
description: Powerful 4-bay NAS for Plex, backups, and personal cloud. Intel quad-core CPU, 4 GB RAM (expandable), dual 2.5 GbE ports, and support for 4K transcoding — all without subscription fees.

title: Amazon Fire TV Cube (Newest Model) — 4K Ultra HD, Hands-Free Alexa
description: Ultra-fast 4K streaming with an octa-core processor and hands-free Alexa—control your TV, soundbar, and smart home by voice. 2x as powerful as Fire TV Stick 4K Max.

title: Linux Tails Bootable USB (32GB) — Dual USB-A/USB-C, Tor Privacy, Encrypted Persistence
description: Boot a clean Tails OS on almost any PC/laptop (UEFI/Legacy). All traffic goes through Tor. Includes persistent encrypted storage for docs and settings.

title: Drawing Robot for Kids — 150 Cards, Voice Prompts, Montessori Learning
description: AI-assisted drawing buddy that teaches kids to sketch step-by-step with voice guidance. Includes 150 cards, built-in music, and persistence-building activities.

title: Meta Quest 3 (512GB) + Batman Arkham Shadow Bundle
description: Next-gen VR with ~30% sharper resolution, 2× graphical power, mixed reality, and the Batman: Arkham Shadow game included. Wireless freedom with 2+ hrs battery life.

title: N-GEN Gaming Chair — Adjustable Recline, Footrest, Lumbar Support (Black)
description: Ergonomic leather gaming/desk chair with footrest, adjustable lumbar, and high back. Great value pick for long sessions at the PC or console.
